description:
Persian is a larger, stronger and faster Siamese-like Pokémon that evolves from Meowth at level 28. Persians are wild in a few areas of Kanto and Johto. It is a popular pet due to its glossy fur, but it can be fickle and cruel.
In the Pokémon anime and Pokémon Yellow Version, Giovanni, the leader of criminal organization Team Rocket and the Viridian City Gym Leader, is shown to have a Persian.
name: Persian
